body_content.explanation: If an area of land is unworked, it has not been used for growing crops, or valuable substances have not been removed from it:
examples: There are still some unworked areas of ground in the valley.
The gold mines have been left unworked since the start of the twentieth century.

body_content.explanation: If a substance or material is unworked, it has not been used, shaped, etc.:
examples: There were two huge pieces of unworked marble on the floor of the workshop.
